tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review:
I am fully satisfied and grateful that I came to RNP clinic for my dental treatment. I thank Dr Rajesh and Dr Suchitra for successfully reconstructing my teeth by fixing bridge and crown thus fulfilling my lifelong wish of having a good smile.They are both so friendly,patient,gentle and interactive while doing a process and I felt I was in safe hands.
They may be one of the best,but to me they are the best.Even though I am 60 I feel much younger now thanks to their expertise!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
This is the most comfortable dental clinic  I have ever been to. Doctor Rajesh and doctor Suchitra Rajesh both  are absolutely fantastic professionals. The dental assistants are just as gifted. and are so friendly and helpful explaining everything.
I highly doubt I will ever be as satisfied by another dental clinic 
5 stars any day

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited the clinic for three times, I noticed both the doctors were busy with many patients. They listen carefully and educate the patient about the problem and the relief. They are good human beings. They have motive of service Even poor patients can get the relief. I pray god to give them the strength to serve the society. India needs such kind of doctors.

review: Just I can say ......super, very friendly, **** *********. I use to visit for dental treatment for my family members, whenever required. This RNP clinic is very trustworthy. The way doctor handle case by case, I too observe. I feel non of the patient will feel bad. All the best to RNP

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: I have  been visiting this clinic for more than 2 decades as Dr. Rajesh and Dr. Suchitra are thorough  in fixing any dental complications.  They are lucid and clear in elaborating what has happened to the dental structure in a layman language.  I like them for talking much about the present condition. Their correct diagnosis and possible remedial options put before the patient help to take better decisions.  They use best materials in the industry while fixing the problems. Their assisting doctors and supporting staff  are satisfactory.  Now they have renewed their equipments.  Only burden on the clients' part  is their fee structure is costlier.  But they do the justice in the care and concern of the patients.

tags: Wait time,
review: the Dr is not on time to the clinic.  1 hr late. on the 1st visit.  and today on sunday he had given appointments and did the same again..  40 min late. patients keep waiting. I had told the recipient pervious day. if the doctor is going to be late pls tell me in advance so that I plan according. I can understand if the is busy seen other patient and it is late, that fine because some time some patients need more time. but here, Dr is late to clinic.  not once.  only visit if u have ample time and ready to wait  for the Dr to come to clinic

His experience is very visible when he speaks of the issue. Very confident and most importantly very straight forward. 
Executed the RCT treatment as promised and the clinic staff are also very helpful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have met Dr. Rajesh for the past 12 years. A very kind, friendly, cooperative doctor. He is a very experienced doctor. I am very satisfied with the treatment. I would recommend visiting the clinic for getting the best results.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I feel better mentally and physically good environment good communication doctor talking friendly really good treatment i feel happy tq sir
Doctor didn’t give any prescription and bill… **** **** ****** ** ***** *****  ** pushing for some cosmetic additions but it is very surprising that they didn’t give any prescription
reply_text: Be true to your conscious when writing comments. Firstly your father had started with antibiotics so we asked him to continue the same, so there was no need for any priscription. Secondly when the receptionist asked you to wait as signature of the doctor was pending on the bill, you said that you are in a hurry to celebrate  father's birthday and have a party that night. Finally we were not ready to do any treatment as you were traveling and so suggest treatment and  asked to get it done in your hometown as you were  travelling in 2days. Your father also asked us to suggest a dentist in Delhi as he  was not happy with his previous dentist. "God bless you"
